content: skill level experienced finished measurements neck 27 length to bottom of longest point 30 not including fringe materials berroco suede tri-color 50 grs 8 balls #3798 chihuahua mc berroco suede 50 grs 4 balls #3767 rawhide cc crochet hooks 4 50 mm g and 5 00 mm h or size to obtain gauge 1 safety pin for marker gauge 5 trpst and 10 row = 4 in triple puff st using larger hook 17 sts and 10 row = 4 in double_crochet using smaller hook special stitches puff triple puff double puff bobble poncho is crocheted from the neck down most of the upper section of the poncho is worked in the round the rest of the poncho and the points are worked back and forth
